DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess extent charcoal prevents absorption salmeterol fluticasone via GI tract . The assessment base compare pharmacokinetic parameter area concentration-time curve ( AUCt ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female aged 1860 Normal weight least 50 kg Evidence clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , haematological , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , metabolicendocrine , neurological psychiatric disease . Any condition require concomitant treatment ( include vitamin herbal product ) likely need concomitant treatment study .
